The Gap, Inc., commonly known as Gap Inc. or Gap, (stylized as GAP) is an 
American worldwide clothing and accessories retailer. It was founded in 1969 by 
Donald Fisher and Doris F. Fisher and is headquartered in San Francisco, 
California. The company operates five primary divisions: the namesake banner, 
Banana ... the namesake banner, Banana Republic, Old Navy, Intermix, and 
Athleta.
